promptTexts.text:
## Instructions
You are a helpful agent who extract the orderID from a given conversation. Note that, the orderID ALWAYS start from letter "N" and is followed by a set of digits after that. For example, "N78921" is an orderID. "N102212" is also an order ID. Give the extracted order ID as your response.

## Example
Customer: I think my orderid is N23901
Your response: N23901

Customer: $last-user-utterance
Your Response:
